import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public Eventos: any = []; widthImg = 50; marginImg = 2; showImg = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.GetEventos(); } alterarImg() { this.showImg = !this.showImg; } public GetEventos(): void{ this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/Eventos').subscribe( response => this.Eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
